file_summary: This HTML file defines a Thymeleaf layout fragment named 'layout', serving as a base template for a web application, likely a Spring PetClinic application given the title. It includes common HTML head elements such as meta tags for character set, compatibility, and viewport, a favicon, and a dynamic title. It links to external resources like Font Awesome CSS and a custom petclinic.css. The body contains a responsive navigation bar using Bootstrap 5, featuring dynamically generated menu items (Home, Find Owners, Veterinarians, Error) using another internal Thymeleaf fragment 'menuItem'. This layout also includes a placeholder (`th:insert="${template}"`) where specific page content can be injected, and a footer displaying a Spring logo. Finally, it imports the Bootstrap JavaScript bundle for interactive elements. This file is crucial for maintaining a consistent look and feel across multiple pages in the application.
